nt a mode Yan, I said he missles exploded on the right and left side of

Iron Raptor, not on her body at all. 

        Marine's eyes bulged with th=
e optic blast ready to strike at Iron 
  Raptor, and they did. The sets of =
blasts cut thin green lines through the 
  smoke at the beast. 
        Aci=
d splattered Marine, and small holes began to bubble on his armor 
  as the=
 acrid smell and steam rose. Grabbing onto his plasma assult riffle 
  with=
 both hands, he aimed, and released a spitfire of plasma, 25 shots, at IR. =


        Craken was in his assault chapper , and picked up Prowl even befo=
re he 
  left the ground. Craken, large and armed with a dual chain gun and=
 missle 
  launchers, sent four missles scattering at Prowl as his chain gu=
n lit up 
  sending 25 shots each. 

        Adrax is sent to the ground as=
 one missles explodes on his back, 
  opening a nasty slit. He turns over a=
nd counter attacks with 15 blasts from 
  two angry optics. 

        Hell =
Beast see's the discharge by Killfest on a small wrist radar, 
  turns, and=
 slams Inferno into them. With a bright blaze Infern ofel to the 
  ground =
with his head comically spinning on his neck. Hel lBeast goffed, and 
  fir=
ed his chain gun at Killfest. 
        Meanwhile, The blasts fired by Eleme=
nt, not to sure which one, burst 
  around them. The Four Predacons began t=
o run, taking numerous hits.
